supermarket

Class Caisse

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimResource
      • supermarket.Caisse

  • public class Caisse
extends SimResource
    This class implements a cash desk for the supermarket.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

        protected void displayInfoEndService(SimEntity pEntity)
        Description copied from class: SimResource
        Logs default information about the end of service of an entity by this resource. This is a hook operation and may be overridden by subclasses.
        Overrides:
        displayInfoEndService in class SimResource
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The entity that has been served by this resource.

      • displayInfoStartWaiting

        protected void displayInfoStartWaiting(SimEntity pEntity)
        Description copied from class: SimResource

        Parameters:

      • getServiceTime

        protected double getServiceTime(SimEntity pEntity)
        Returns how much time is needed to serve a client by this cash desk. Here, it depens on a random average time to handle an article and the number of articles the current client has.
        Specified by:
        getServiceTime in class SimResource
        Parameters:
        pEntity - The client this cash desk will serve.
        Returns:
        The time the client will spend at this cash desk.
